QuestData.Title: The Black Shield
QuestData.Description: Hmmm, there's writing right here on the rim of the shield, but it's hard to read from all the burned stuff.$b$bI need acid to make it clear. Venom from the darkmist spiders would do good. The spiders have taken over an old mine, the Darkmist Cavern, northwest of the village. Get me some of their sacs and I can clean this up.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 5 Acidic Venom Sacs from Darkmist spiders.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you get them sacs from the spiders?
QuestData.RewardText: I don't like spiders that are so big I can't sit on them and squish them.$b$bThanks for getting them, $n. Now I rip them open and pour them onto the shield...
